com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Memory

  • public class Memory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing memory in RAM in Mano's computer as detailed in:
    Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
    By M. Morris Mano
    Published by Prentice-Hall, c 1993
    Chapter 5, pp 123-172.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String address
      The address of this memory location in three digit hexadecimal.
      private java.lang.String instruction
      The corresponding source code instruction at this memory location if any.
      private java.lang.String label
      The label at this memory location if any.
      private int value
      The value of at this memory location.
